name: gemini-safe-command-extension
description: Safe shell command executor for Gemini CLI with whitelist validation

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_config_user_agent && !process.env.npm_config_user_agent.includes('pnpm')) { console.error('\u001b[31mError: This project uses pnpm. Please use pnpm install instead of npm install.\u001b[0m\n'); process.exit(1); }"

author: sakistyle
